meanings.sent1: The pasta had a garlicky flavor that reminded me of my mom's cooking.
meanings.sent2: The garlicky sauce added a delicious kick to the dish.
meanings.sent3: I could smell the garlicky aroma from the kitchen, making my stomach growl.
meanings.sent4: The garlicky scent wafted through the air, enticing everyone in the room.
meanings.sent5: The garlicky taste lingered on my tongue long after the meal was over.

meanings.definition: Having a strong smell or taste of garlic.
meanings.sent1: The garlicky breadsticks were a hit at the party.
meanings.sent2: She avoided the garlicky dish because she had a date later.
meanings.sent3: The garlicky breath of the dragon scared away the villagers.
meanings.sent4: The garlicky aroma filled the room, overpowering all other scents.
meanings.sent5: The garlicky flavor of the soup was so intense, it made my eyes water.
